trans-unit.source: Represents a control that contains multiple items that share the same space on the screen.
trans-unit.target: Representa um controlo que contém vários itens que partilham o mesmo espaço no ecrã.

trans-unit.source: The TabControl is useful for minimizing screen space usage while allowing an application to expose a large amount of data.
trans-unit.target: TabControl é útil para minimizar a utilização de espaço do ecrã ao permitir que uma aplicação para expor uma grande quantidade de dados.

trans-unit.source: A TabControl consists of multiple <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> objects that share the same screen space.
trans-unit.target: Um TabControl consiste de vários <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>objetos que partilham o mesmo espaço de ecrã.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>

trans-unit.source: Only one <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> in a TabControl is visible at a time.
trans-unit.target: Apenas um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>um TabControl é visível um momento.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>

trans-unit.source: When a user selects the tab of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>, the contents of that <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> become visible and the contents of the other <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> objects are hidden.
trans-unit.target: Quando um utilizador seleciona o separador de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>, o conteúdo desse <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>ficar visível e o conteúdo das outras <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>objetos estão ocultas.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>

trans-unit.source: TabControl is an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>, which means it can contain a collection of objects of any type (such as string, image, or panel).
trans-unit.target: TabControl é um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>, que significa pode conter uma coleção de objetos de qualquer tipo (como cadeia, a imagem ou o painel).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> class.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: Customizing the TabControl Control To apply the same property settings to multiple TabControl controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Personalizar a TabControl controlo para aplicar as mesmas definições de propriedade para vários TabControl controlos, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: Pode modificar a predefinição <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>para lhe dar controlo um aspeto exclusivo.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como criar um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, consulte [personalizar o aspeto de um controlo existente, criando um ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the TabControl, see [TabControl Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para ver as partes e Estados que são específicos para a TabControl, consulte [TabControl estilos e modelos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de dependência para este controlo podem ser definidas pelo estilo de predefinido do controlo.

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: Se uma propriedade é definida por um estilo predefinido, a propriedade poderá alterar o valor predefinido do quando o controlo é apresentado na aplicação.

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: O estilo predefinido é determinado pelo qual tema de ambiente de trabalho é utilizado quando a aplicação está em execução.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [predefinido o WPF temas](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in TabControl control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Definir uma propriedade visual apenas terá um efeito se essa propriedade ambos presentes no modelo de predefinido do controlo de TabControl e é definida através da utilização de um.

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).
trans-unit.target: Pode encontrar uma lista de propriedades visuais na secção "Alterar o Visual estrutura de um controlo" [personalizar o aspeto de um controlo existente, criando um ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TabControl"></xref>.class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TabControl"> </xref>. classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets a composite string that specifies how to format the contents of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TabItem"></xref> objects if they are displayed as strings.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma cadeia composta que especifica como formatar o conteúdo a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TabItem"> </xref> objetos se são apresentadas como cadeias.

trans-unit.source: ContentStringFormat can be a predefined, composite, or custom string format.
trans-unit.target: ContentStringFormat pode ser um formato de cadeia predefinidas, composto ou personalizado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about string formats, see [Formatting Types](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre os formatos de cadeia, consulte [Formatting Types](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentTemplate%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl>, the ContentStringFormat property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Se definir o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentTemplate%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentTemplateSelector%2A>de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl>, a propriedade ContentStringFormat é ignorada.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: A composite string that specifies how to format the contents of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TabItem"></xref> objects if they are displayed as strings.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia composta que especifica como formatar o conteúdo a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TabItem"> </xref> objetos se são apresentadas como cadeias.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentStringFormat*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentStringFormat*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentStringFormat*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> to apply to any <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TabItem"></xref> that does not have a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate*> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateSelector*> property defined.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"> </xref> para aplicar a qualquer <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TabItem"> </xref> que não tem um <> </> *> ou <> </> *> propriedade definida.

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Property Element Usage ## XAML Values *ResourceExtension* One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`.
trans-unit.target: # # Utilização do atributo de XAML ``` ``` # # utilização de elemento de propriedade XAML # # XAML valores *ResourceExtension* um dos seguintes: `StaticResource`, ou `DynamicResource`.

trans-unit.source: See [XAML Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Consulte [XAML recursos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: *TemplateResourceKey* The key that identifies the template being requested.
trans-unit.target: *TemplateResourceKey* a chave que identifica o modelo que está a ser solicitado.

trans-unit.source: The key refers to an existing resource in a <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: A chave refere-se a um recurso existente no <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.</xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Property element syntax is technically possible, but not recommended.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Sintaxe do elemento de propriedade é tecnicamente possível, mas não recomendadas.

trans-unit.source: See [Inline Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Consulte [Inline estilos e modelos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência ||| |-|-| | Campo Identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum |

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> to apply to any <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TabItem"></xref> that does not have a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate*> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateSelector*> property defined.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"> </xref> para aplicar a qualquer <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TabItem"> </xref> que não tem um <> </> *> ou <> </> *> propriedade definida.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentTemplate*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentTemplate*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector"></xref> that provides custom logic for choosing the template that is used to display the content of the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector"> </xref> lógica personalizada que fornece para escolher o modelo que é utilizado para apresentar o conteúdo do controlo.

trans-unit.source: Typically, you create a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector> when you have more than one <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> for the same type of objects and you want to supply your own logic to choose a <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> to apply based on the properties of each data object.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, cria um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>quando existe mais do que um <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>para o mesmo tipo de objetos e de pretende fornecer a suas próprias lógica para escolher um <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>a aplicar com base nas propriedades de cada objeto de dados.</xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>

trans-unit.source: Note that if you have objects of different types, you can set the <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate.DataType%2A> property on the <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: Tenha em atenção que, se tiver de objetos de diferentes tipos, pode definir a <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate.DataType%2A>propriedade <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>.</xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate.DataType%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do that, then there is no need to create a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>.
trans-unit.target: Se, fazê-lo, em seguida, não é necessário para criar um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>

trans-unit.source: Furthermore, if you have objects of the same type but with different properties, you can also consider using a <xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger> or a data converter.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, se tiver de objetos do mesmo tipo, mas com propriedades diferentes, pode também considerar a utilização de um <xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger>ou um conversor de dados.</xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Data Templating Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [descrição geral de Templating dados](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To create a template selector, create a class that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector> and override the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para criar um Seletor de modelo, crie uma classe que herda de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>e substituir a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>

trans-unit.source: After your class is defined, you can assign an instance of the class to the template selector property of your element.
trans-unit.target: Depois da classe estiver definida, pode atribuir uma instância da classe para a propriedade de Seletor de modelo do seu elemento.

trans-unit.source: If both the ContentTemplateSelector and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentTemplate%2A> properties are set, then this property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Se ambas a ContentTemplateSelector e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentTemplate%2A>propriedades forem definidas, em seguida, esta propriedade é ignorada.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *ResourceExtension* One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`.
trans-unit.target: # # Utilização do atributo de XAML ``` ``` # # utilização de elemento de propriedade XAML ``` ``` # # XAML valores *ResourceExtension* um dos seguintes: `StaticResource`, ou `DynamicResource`.

trans-unit.source: See [XAML Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Consulte [XAML recursos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: *DataTemplateSelectorClassKey* The key that identifies the selector implementation being requested.
trans-unit.target: *DataTemplateSelectorClassKey* a chave que identifica a implementação de Seletor que está a ser solicitada.

trans-unit.source: The key refers to a derived class that implements a practical <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A> override.
trans-unit.target: A chave se refere a uma classe derivada que implementa um práticos <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A>substituir.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information about how to map your custom class, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como mapear uma classe personalizada, consulte [XAML espaços de nomes e o espaço de nomes de mapeamento para WPF XAML](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: You can also programmatically add an instance of your <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector> class as a resource to a resource dictionary.
trans-unit.target: Através de programação também pode adicionar uma instância do seu <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>classe como um recurso a um dicionário de recursos.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>

trans-unit.source: *MyDataTemplateSelectorImplementation* A class derived from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector> and overrides <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: *MyDataTemplateSelectorImplementation* uma classe derivada de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>e substituições <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>

trans-unit.source: For information about how to map your custom class, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](../Topic/XAML%20Namespaces%20and%20Namespace%20Mapping%20for%20WPF%20XAML.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como mapear uma classe personalizada, consulte [XAML espaços de nomes e o espaço de nomes de mapeamento para WPF XAML](../Topic/XAML%20Namespaces%20and%20Namespace%20Mapping%20for%20WPF%20XAML.md).

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência ||| |-|-| | Campo Identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum |

trans-unit.source: A ContentTemplateSelector.
trans-unit.target: Um ContentTemplateSelector.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentTemplateSelector*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentTemplateSelector*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentTemplateSelector*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Creates or identifies the element used to display the specified item.
trans-unit.target: Cria ou identifica o elemento utilizado para apresentar o item especificado.

trans-unit.source: The element used to display the specified item.
trans-unit.target: O elemento utilizado para apresentar o item especificado.

trans-unit.source: Determines if the specified item is (or is eligible to be) its own <xref uid="langword_csharp_ItemContainer" name="ItemContainer" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o item especificado é (ou é elegível para ser) a sua própria <xref uid="langword_csharp_ItemContainer" name="ItemContainer" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Specified item.
trans-unit.target: Item especificado.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the item is its own <xref uid="langword_csharp_ItemContainer" name="ItemContainer" href=""></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> se o item é o suas próprias <xref uid="langword_csharp_ItemContainer" name="ItemContainer" href=""> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called when <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate*> is called.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate*>é chamado.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: This method updates the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContent%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContentTemplate%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContentTemplateSelector%2A> properties to the objects used by the currently selected <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>.
trans-unit.target: Este método atualiza o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContent%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContentTemplate%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContentTemplateSelector%2A>as propriedades dos objetos utilizados pelo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>atualmente selecionada.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContentTemplateSelector%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContentTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContent%2A>

trans-unit.source: Provides an appropriate <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TabControlAutomationPeer"></xref> implementation for this control, as part of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] automation infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Fornece apropriadas <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TabControlAutomationPeer"> </xref> implementação para este controlo, como parte do [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] infraestrutura de automatização.

trans-unit.source: The type-specific <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> implementation.
trans-unit.target: O específicos do tipo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> implementação.

trans-unit.source: Called when <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.IsInitialized*> is set to **true**.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando <> </> *> está definido como * *verdadeiro**.

trans-unit.source: The control raises the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.IsInitialized%2A> event by calling <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O controlo gera o <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.IsInitialized%2A>evento chamando <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.IsInitialized%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Routed Events Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [descrição geral de eventos encaminhados](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Initialized"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Disponibiliza dados para o <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Initialized"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Called to update the current selection when items change.
trans-unit.target: Chamado para atualizar a seleção atual quando forem efetuadas alterações de itens.

trans-unit.source: The event data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator.ItemsChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Os dados de eventos para o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator.ItemsChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.KeyDown"></xref> routed event that occurs when the user presses a key.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a classe de processamento para a <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.KeyDown"> </xref> evento encaminhado que ocorre quando o utilizador prime uma chave.

trans-unit.source: This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.KeyDown> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true` when the user presses CTRL+TAB, CTRL+SHIFT+TAB, HOME, or END to navigate between <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: Esta implementação marca o <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.KeyDown>eventos como processada, definindo o <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>propriedade dos dados de eventos para `true` quando o utilizador premir CTRL + TAB, CTRL + SHIFT + TAB, home page ou de fim para navegar entre <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>objetos.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.KeyDown>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this implementation does not change the handled state (the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property) of the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.KeyDown> event data.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, esta implementação não altera o estado processado (o <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>propriedade) da <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.KeyDown>dados de eventos.</xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.KeyDown> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Provides data for <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Disponibiliza dados para <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged"> </xref> evento encaminhado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl> updates the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContent%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContentTemplate%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContentTemplateSelector%2A> properties to the objects used by the currently selected <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl>atualizações a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContent%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContentTemplate%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContentTemplateSelector%2A>as propriedades dos objetos utilizados pelo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>atualmente selecionada.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContentTemplateSelector%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContentTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContent%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl>

trans-unit.source: The control raises the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged> event by calling <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O controlo gera o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged>evento chamando <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Routed Events Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [descrição geral de eventos encaminhados](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Provides data for <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.SelectionChangedEventArgs"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Disponibiliza dados para <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.SelectionChangedEventArgs"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the content of the currently selected <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TabItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o conteúdo atualmente selecionadas <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TabItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property is updated to reference the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> of the active <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> when the tab selection changes.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é atualizada para a referência a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>do Active Directory <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>Quando altera a seleção de separador.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl> uses the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to bind the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to this property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl>utiliza o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade à qual vincular o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade para esta propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: If you create a new <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl>, be sure to the bind the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to this property by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to "SelectedContent" or by using [TemplateBinding Markup Extension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Se criar um novo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl>, certifique-se para a enlace a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade para esta propriedade ao definir o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade "SelectedContent" ou ao utilizar [extensão de Markup TemplateBinding](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: Gets a composite string that specifies how to format the content of the currently selected <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TabItem"></xref> if it is displayed as a string.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma cadeia composta que especifica como formatar o conteúdo atualmente selecionadas <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TabItem"> </xref> se for apresentado como uma cadeia.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl> updates this property to reference to the <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> for the active <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> when the tab selection changes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl>atualizações esta propriedade para efeitos de referência para o <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>para o Active Directory <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>Quando altera a seleção de separador.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> </xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl>

trans-unit.source: Set <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate%2A> property on a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> to specify the <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>.
trans-unit.target: Definir <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>ou a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate%2A>propriedade de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>para especificar <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>para <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> </xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If you create a new <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl>, be sure to the bind the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to this property by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to "SelectedContent" or by using [TemplateBinding Markup Extension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Se criar um novo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl>, certifique-se para a enlace a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade para esta propriedade ao definir o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade "SelectedContent" ou ao utilizar [extensão de Markup TemplateBinding](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>
